title: FS/FT: T206 Miscut Double/No Name - PRICES REDUCED (11/2)
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T206 Miscut Double/No Name - PRICES REDUCED (11/2)
posts.post_content:
Thinning out some of my collection.  Entertaining trades as well; I collect T206 double names and am putting together a T206 collection in SGC40.  

These are all double names except for the Dessau which is a "no name".  Selling as a singles; prices include delivery; payment via standard paypal.

Rube Dessau - $20
Larry Doyle (With Bat) - SOLD
Jack Hannifan - SOLD
Dutch Revelle - $75
Jim Stephens - SOLD
Doc White (Pitching) - SOLD

[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/DessauDoyleF/web.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/DessauDoyleB/web.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/RevelleStephensWhiteF/web.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/RevelleStephensWhiteB/web.jpg[/IMG]
I have a Mullins SC Factory 42 overprint in similar condition to your cards.  What would you offer?
